features: GRASS FED BEEF POT ROAST: Contains 1 pouch of toddler puree made from grass fed meat and ethically sourced bone broth made with organic ingredients, and Certified USDA Organic vegetables, shiitake mushrooms and herbs.
PERFECT SAVORY BLENDS: Contains more protein and fats than sugar so your little one gets the most nutrition per bite, while also expanding their palate to richer, more savory flavors.
NO SUGARY FRUITS: With no added sugars or sugary fruits our veggie-first toddler pouch meals have added bone broth for a protein and collagen boost!
MINDFULLY MADE: With bone broth that's rich in easily digestible protein and amino acids that help build connective tissue and joints.

CLEAN LABEL PROJECT PURITY AWARD WINNER: This certification verifies rigorous ingredient testing for over 400 contaminants, including chemicals of concern and industrial and environmental toxins and contaminants (like heavy metals, pesticide residues, and plasticizers).
FAMILY OWNED COMPANY: We're here for you and your little one! If you have any questions, concerns or feedback, please reach out to us!

Are your pouches BPA free and recyclable? Yes! Our pouches are made from BPA-free plastic and the caps are recyclable anywhere that plastic is recycled. What is the shelf life of your pouches? Unopened pouches can be consumed up to 18 months from the date of manufacture. You can find the best by date on the back of the pouch under the nutrition facts panel. Be sure to refrigerate it and consume or freeze within 24 hours of opening. Do you offer other baby food products? Yes! You can view our whole line of products and learn more about us at our Amazon Storefront. You can visit by clicking the "Visit the Serenity Kids Store" link near the product title on the Product Detail Page (just scroll up). Why are we worth every penny? We want your little one to have the most amazing, high quality ingredients on the planet, and we know you do too! This comes at a premium, but we think it’s worth it. We strive to offer the best ingredients to build a stronger, healthier generation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We LOVE Serenity Kids and so does baby. I was disappointed when I saw how many baby food products were purely just fruits and sugar and lacking any nutritional content of substance. I chose to feed my baby meats and vegetables due to the valuable nutrition content of IRON and FIBER baby needs.We started "solids" when baby was around 5 months old. I started with some well-known name brands before deciding to make the investment and switched to Serenity Kids instead. Serenity Kids specializes in super high-quality kids food. All their ingredients are ethically sourced, the vegetables are 100% organic, and they’re full of healthy fats. Their focus is on nutrient density, regenerative agriculture and all their packaging is eco-friendly.I would easily and highly recommend these to anyone with a little one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "No more chicken broth, please!"
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased for a cancer patient on a liquid diet. So, I was pleased to find something nutritious (besides the usual chicken or beef broth) to entice him to drink more calories. It was a bit pricey for the amount of product, but worth it when you are missing home-cooked meals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not just for kids. A great snack for long drives.
reviews.reviewText: Our daughter buys these for her toddler (1-1/2 years old). I do a lot of long distance driving and thought that these would be a convenient way to have a snack or even a small meal. I have just spent six days behind the wheel on a road trip and they worked out great! A good mixture of protein (beef, turkey, chicken) and veggies, especially the combinations. They are easy and safe to use while driving, have good flavor, are more filling than I thought they would be, and are certainly healthier than the snacks that are usually available on the road.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pouch food I can feel good about giving to my toddler
reviews.reviewText: I love the quality ingredients: healthy fats, bone broth, grass fed beef, and paleo starches. When I have to feed something pre-made I don't feel bad if it's from Serenity. Pricey but worth it.I only wish they made more flavors and had a wider variety of green veggies in the pouches beyond just spinach, kale, or peas. Most have either squash or pumpkin or sweet potato as the starchy component which all have a lot of beta carotene and if eaten enough can give your baby's skin an orange cast (trust me we had a nurse comment on it when she saw my baby). What about mixing it up with parsnips, turnips, rutabaga, potatoes, purple sweet potatoes, cassava, daikon, etc?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hear Me Out!
reviews.reviewText: Okay, all moms, you've got to hear me out on this one!The first time my kiddo tried this he hated the flavor! I mentioned it in my IG stories and the company themselves sent me tips and tricks on how to serve these meats.The problem was, my baby had never had baby meat before, just fruits and veggies. Please understand that the thickness is a little thicker, but still creamy enough for even new eaters. We tried different recipes and ideas and now my son love them and gets his proteins.I am SUPER impressed with this company and their willingness to help and offer advice and ideas. Their products are HIGH quality and made of only the best ingredients which makes this mama very happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tasty and healthy food my little one
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this food. I've struggled getting him to eat baby food but not serenity kids. I I'm happy for the organic ingredients in their food. I'll continue to buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love this brand but not this flavor.
reviews.reviewText: My son usually gobbles Serenity products up. This flavor pouch was different from his favorite. I tried several times to give him one of these pouches, but he wouldn't eat it. It could be just him but this flavor isn't it. The ingredients are supreme, but I was disappointed they went to waste because they were expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality meat based baby food
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product for babies being introduced to meat purées. My 16 month old is teething and has preferred softer food recently. She liked the flavor and it is definitely a big upgrade from normal meat baby food!!! I’m also a huge fan of turmeric, but you have to definitely supervise your toddler with these, as they are a little oily and turmeric stains. Squeezing the packet to mix the contents before opening helps!!!! It’s a little higher in price compared to most baby food, but it also has very high quality ingredients.
Product description leads you to believe that you're paying 45-50$ for a bos of baby food pouches, but in reality it's a SINGLE pouch. When returned no reimbursement was issued. This is a scam.
Très cher pour 1 sachet..de plus, mon paquet était expiré! :(
